segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen; I can feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is gushing water onto the floor, creating a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely engrossed in her dish-drying, ignoring everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is literally submerged in the water, yet she doesn't react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me so frustrated to see such a clear and present danger go unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, trying to steal cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a stool that's practically falling over backwards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a dangerous situation for them both.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is wet, and if that stool tips, someone is going to get hurt badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the crash of dishes and the splash of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This entire scene is just a mess, both literally and figuratively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene immediately before things get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The disregard for safety is truly astounding to me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a terrible waste of water, too.
segments.speaker: PAR
